packages.title: Eternal Spring Discovery
packages.description: Experience the transformation of Medellín, the 'City of Eternal Spring'. Explore innovative urban projects, vibrant neighborhoods, and enjoy the perfect year-round climate that makes this city so special.
highlights: Metro system and cable car tours
Guatapé and El Peñón day trip

packages.title: Innovation & Culture Experience
packages.description: Discover Medellín's incredible transformation through innovation districts, world-class museums, and cultural spaces. Perfect for those interested in urban development and Colombian creativity.
highlights: Modern Art Museum and Casa de la Memoria
Coffee farm visit in nearby mountains

packages.title: Coffee Culture Adventure
packages.description: Immerse yourself in Colombia's famous coffee culture with visits to local fincas, coffee tastings, and traditional preparation methods. Learn about the coffee process from bean to cup.
highlights: Local coffee shop crawl in Medellín

packages.title: Outdoor Adventure Escape
packages.description: Take advantage of Medellín's perfect climate and stunning landscapes. Perfect for adventure seekers who want to combine city exploration with outdoor activities in the Andes.

packages.title: Luxury Medellín Experience
packages.description: Experience Medellín in luxury style with premium accommodations, fine dining, exclusive tours, and VIP experiences. Perfect for travelers seeking comfort and sophistication.
highlights: Private helicopter tour over the city
Personal shopping tour in Premium Plaza

packages.title: Family Friendly Medellín
packages.description: Family adventure in the City of Eternal Spring with activities for all ages. Enjoy educational experiences, parks, and family-friendly attractions in this welcoming city.
highlights: Family cable car rides with city views
